key.name: auto-refresh
key.description: Whether the screen should be automatically refreshed regularly

key.name: bw-mode
key.description: Selects the mode driving the display. Possible values are: 0 = Grayscale mode 1 = BW+Dither mode 2 = Black & White mode 3 = DU4 waveform mode

key.name: bw-dither-invert
key.description: Whether the screen should be inverted in Black and White Dithering mode

key.name: no-off-screen
key.description: Whether the current screen contents should be kept when entering suspend

key.name: travel-mode
key.description: Whether to suppress waking up the device when the cover is opened, so it doesn't drain the battery from shifting around in your bag
